text:
Add the ability to rename a file or directory.  This is incredibly useful for 
using the FTP task for deployment and making a backup copy.  Currently all my 
build scripts must first download all the files, then create a backup 
directory, and then upload the files to the backup directory.  I'd like to be 
able to just rename the directory and deploy my application which would cut my 
deployment time by about 3.
creator: dmorehouse@gearworks.com

text: *** Bug 29811 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
